statement_text: Former dairy veterinarian Dr. Meghan Davis, an associate professor in the Department of Environmental Health and Engineering at the Johns Hopkins Bloomberg School of Public Health, shared advice for Newsweek readers on how pet owners can take preventive measures to ensure their pets remain clear of the disease, also known as avian influenza or H5N1.
